title: New Google AI tool can study DNA changes and predict disease risk
description: Google DeepMind's AlphaGenome can analyse long stretches of DNA to predict how hidden genetic changes affect gene regulation, offering new clues to cancer, heart disease and mental illness

title: Building Tomorrow's AI Solutions Together: Why the ET Gen AI Hackathon is Your Strategic Partnership Opportunity
description: Discover strategic partnership opportunities at the ET Gen AI Hackathon. Connect with India's brightest AI talent, validate technologies, and build collaborative ecosystems driving ₹10L+ innovation in generative AI.

title: Choosing The Right AI In 2026 Is No Longer About Choosing The Right Model
description: In 2026, choosing the right AI comes down to matching capability profiles to specific tasks, risk levels and business outcomes, rather than chasing benchmark winners.

title: Amid Sentient AI Buzz, Pichai's Old "Unexpected" Abilities Comment Viral
description: Google CEO said that AI models are "prone to errors" and should be used in conjunction with other tools.

title: Korea bolsters AI capabilities to tackle crypto market manipulation
description: The Financial Supervisory Service (FSS) is upgrading an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered platform for virtual asset surveillance as part of efforts to crack down on increasingly sophisticated market manipulation, the watchdog said Monday. The platform, Virtual Assets Intelligence System for Trading Analysis (VISTA), is designed to process massive volumes of trading data, automatically flag abnormal transactions and visualize trading behavior. The financial watchdog said VISTA has already become a core investigative tool in crypto-related enforcement cases. Last December, FSS expanded its computing capacity by installing two new servers equipped with high-performance central and graphics processing units. Leveraging this infrastructure, the agency has developed an automated detection model that identifies suspected price-rigging periods without manual intervention. The system scans every possible trading interval — from seconds to months — and calculates abnormal trading metrics across all segments, allowing authorities to uncover manipulation patterns regardless of how frequently
